pageContext.claim: “Each of you is fulfilling a vital role in our nation. You are challenging the media gatekeepers and the corporate sensors to bring the facts straight to the American people and that is what you are doing.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump said this to a gathering of supporters who are active on social media. The claim that they "bring the facts straight to the American people" is deceptive. It's common to see Trump supporters repeat his false or misleading claims on social media, especially his claims about the special counsel's Russia investigation. One of the attendees, James O'Keefe of Project Veritas, and an associate attempted to dupe The Washington Post into publishing false allegations about Roy Moore, the Alabama Republican who ran for Senate in 2017. Another attendee, Bill Mitchell, has used social media to spread conspiracy theories from QAnon.
